text: I listen to music for emotion and I get zero emotion from rap.
author: Sebastian Bach

text: I just do what I do. I like to make music.
author: Neil Young

text: I want my music to do the explaining.
author: Demi Lovato

text: I was lucky enough to be the lady that was asked to be Maria in the Sound Of Music, and that film was fortunate enough to be huge hit. The same with Mary Poppins. I got terribly lucky in that respect.
author: Julie Andrews

text: As a rule, my focus is on classical music, but I love jazz. I love everything, actually.
author: Julie Andrews
